definitions.definition: the univalent N 3 radical or functional group or any ester containing this group
the N 3 anion or any salt containing this anion ( N − = N + = N − {\displaystyle {\ce {^{-}N={\overset {+}{N}}=N^{-}}}} )

main_definition: ( organic chemistry ) the univalent N 3 radical or functional group or any ester containing this group
secondary_definitions: ( inorganic chemistry ) the N 3 anion or any salt containing this anion ( N − = N + = N − {\displaystyle {\ce {^{-}N={\overset {+}{N}}=N^{-}}}} )
